name: date-fns-example-webpack4
description: Example of date-fns usage with webpack 4.x
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: yarn build-date-fns && yarn build-webpack && yarn build-uglify
scripts.build-webpack: webpack example=./example.js fp=./fp.js misc=./misc.js minimal=./minimal.js constants=./constants.js --output-path dist --output-filename [name].js
scripts.build-uglify: yarn build-uglify-example && yarn build-uglify-fp && yarn build-uglify-misc && yarn build-uglify-minimal && yarn build-uglify-constants && yarn stats-size
scripts.stats-size:
echo "Minimal size: $(gzip-size dist/minimal.min.js)
Format size: $(gzip-size dist/example.min.js)
FP size: $(gzip-size dist/fp.min.js)
Misc size: $(gzip-size dist/misc.min.js)"
scripts.test: yarn test-example && yarn test-fp && yarn test-misc && yarn test-constants
